item.title: Gadwal Police Quickly Solve Tejeshwar Murder Case, Receive Cash Rewards
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: The Gadwal police swiftly solved the high-profile Tejeshwar murder case, gaining praise from the public and authorities in the Telugu states. This quick resolution highlighted their impressive investigative skills.
District Superintendent of Police (SP) T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, awarded cash prizes and commendations to the officers and staff involved as recognition for their outstanding work.

item.title: Wife and her friend among eight arrested in newly-wed man’s murder in Telangana’s Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Eight persons, including a woman and her lover, were arrested in connection with the murder of a 32-year-old surveyor and dance master from Gadwal. The accused were apprehended during a coordinated operation across Gadwal and Kurnool, said a police official.
The prime conspirators have been identified as 23-year-old Aishwarya, the victim’s wife, and her lover V. Tirumala Rao, a 35-year-old manager at Canfin Homes in Kurnool. Investigations revealed that Rao, who was already married, had develop...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Big breakthrough in Telangana murder case: Ganta Tejeshwar's wife Aishwarya, her lover arrested; 2 machetes recovered
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana Murder Case: Police have made a significant breakthrough in the murder investigation of Ganta Tejeshwar, following the arrest of eight people allegedly involved in the crime. The victim, Ganta Tejeshwar, is believed to have been murdered in a plot orchestrated by his wife, Aishwarya, and her lover, V Tirumala Rao, with the assistance of contract killers.
Ganta Tejeshwar, a 32-year-old land surveyor from Jogulamba Gadwal district in Telangana, was murdered on June 17, 2025, just a mont...]]>

item.title: Telangana Murder: How wife’s affair with boss led to husband’s murder; new details emerge in Gadwal case
item.description:
<![CDATA[Poll What measure do you think is more effective in combating crimes within relationships? Stricter background checks and verification before marriage Stronger legal action and faster justice system
HYDERABAD: Jogulamba Gadwal police on Thursday arrested eight people, including a newly-wed woman and her lover, for the abduction and murder of 32-year-old land surveyor Ganta Tejeshwar on June 17.Police said the murder was plotted by V Tirumala Rao, 35, manager at Can Fin Homes Ltd in Kurnool,...]]>
item.author: Tnn

item.title: "Wife, Lover Orchestrate Chilling Honour Killing in Jogulamba Gadwal – 8 Arrested in Swift Police Crackdown"
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A sensational murder case that shook both Telugu states has been cracked within a short period by the Jogulamba Gadwal district police. The investigation revealed that a wife and her paramour conspired to murder her husband, who was allegedly obstructing their illicit relationship. They hired a supari gang (contract killers) to carry out the murder.
District Superintendent of Police (SP) T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, conducted a press meet today revealing crucial details of the case.
Case Bac...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Telangana Murder Case: Newly Married Man Killed By Wife And Lover, Accused Lover On The Run
item.description: <![CDATA[A wife got her husband killed within one month of marriage. Aishwarya got married on May 18 to Tejeswar, dancer & land surveyor in Telangana's Gadwal after convincing him that she is in love with him. Within a month, she conspired with her lover, who was an already married bank manager in Kurnool district of Andhra Pradesh, Tirumal Rao, to hire killers, who slit Tejeswar's throat and dumped his body into a canal. The NBFC bank manager Tirumal Rao was arrested today. Jogulamba Gadwal district SP ...]]>
